attributes.action: Stop ignoring the real cause of congestion and pollution on our roads, HGVs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
HGVs cause the most pollution of any vehicle type and are the primary source of congestion on our roads,
Their "drag racing" habits of driving in lane 1 at 56mph and lane 2 at 56.2mph effectively reduce our motorways and trunks roads to single carriageways for the rest of us. How many of us have been stuck behind an HGV in lane 2 of the A14 for mile after mile as they creep past their buddies churning black smoke out as they go? Lets get the freight back on the railways where it belongs.
